welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kinrooi, the charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. Get ready to discover its hidden gems and immerse yourself in its unique culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport offers domestic and international flights for both leisure and business travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport is equipped to handle a variety of goods and products, providing efficient and reliable transportation services.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, mostly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eindhoven Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions.
